news.title: Classes, work suspended on Eid'l Fitr (May 3, 2022)
news.brief_desc: The Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Maynila joins our Muslim brothers and sisters in the observance of Eid’l Fitr or the Feast of Ramadan on Tuesday, May 3, 2022.
news.long_desc: The Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Maynila joins our Muslim brothers and sisters in the observance of Eid’l Fitr or the Feast of Ramadan on Tuesday, May 3, 2022. All classes and work in PLM are suspended on Tuesday in observance of the national holiday. Eid Mubarak! #WalangPasok

news.title: Half-day suspension of face-to-face classes, work on April 8, 2022
news.brief_desc: Face-to-face classes and onsite work in PLM are suspended tomorrow, April 8, 2022, starting 1 PM to make way for Manila Health Department’s fumigation operations inside the campus.
news.long_desc: Face-to-face classes and onsite work in PLM are suspended tomorrow, April 8, 2022, starting 1 PM to make way for Manila Health Department’s fumigation operations inside the campus. All employees will continue working via online platform during the afternoon.
